name: Ancient Medical Device
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Energy Infused Crystal" "267749" #L "Inactive Ancient Medical Device" "267735" #L "Crystalised Memories of a Doctor" "267726" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Energy Infused Crystal + Inactive Ancient Medical Device = #L "Active Ancient Medical Device" "267914" Skills: | ME1500 | ------------------------------ Active Ancient Medical Device + Crystalised Memories of a Doctor = #L "Ancient Medical Device" "267736" Skills: | ME1500 | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Another handy reusable tool for tradeskillers.
